definition: having the characteristics of pitch or tar, leave slowly and hesitantly
details:
adjective
- having the characteristics of pitch or tar
= synonyms: pitchy
verb
- leave slowly and hesitantly
= synonyms: linger
- be about
= synonyms: lounge, lurk, mill about, mill around, linger, footle, loiter, lollygag, lallygag, hang around, mess about, loaf
